Package com.esri.mo2.client.io

Provides proxies for AXL communication between clients and server.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Esrimap This interface allows a client-side object to access any ESRIMAP server-side object.
SimpleServiceProxy This is a client-side proxy for an IMS service.
StatelessChannel This interface implements a short-lived object created by a ServiceProxy for providing a state-less communication link to an IMS service.
 

Class Summary
Authenticator This class implements an object that is used to authenticate a service request.
AuthHttpURLHandler Deprecated. Use com.esri.mo2.client.io.Authenticator instead.
Base64 Provides encoding of raw bytes to base64-encoded characters, and decoding of base64 characters to raw bytes.
BaseEsrimap Constructs a proxy object that references a remote ESRIMAP instance.
BaseEsrimapSimpleServiceProxy A client-side proxy implementation for accessing an ArcIMS service via an ESRIMAP HTTP connection.
BaseSimpleServiceProxy This class provides base class support for managing the service name and obtaining ServiceInfo.
BaseSocketServiceProxy This class implements a client-side proxy for accessing an IMS service via a direct socket connection.
Codecs This class supports static methods that are used to encrypt strings using 64-bit encoding.
Crypto This class provides an algorithm for encrypting and decrypting strings to enable secure transfer of service requests and responses, to and from the Application Server.
EsrimapCookieLink This class implements methods that are used to receive XML and binary data using Esrimap version 3.x cookie communication protocol.
EsrimapInputStream This class provides methods to receive status headers and data using Esrimap version 3.x protocol.
EsrimapOutputStream This class implements methods to support an authenticated output stream.
EsrimapSecureInputStream This class provides methods to receive encrypted responses from the Application Server.
EsrimapSecureOutputStream This class implements methods to send authenticated requests to the Administrator in the Application Server.
Login Deprecated.  
MessageDigestEncoder This class is used to encode HTTP Authentication headers when using the 'Digest' Authentication method.
Protocol The methods in this class are used to modify the current system properties for the HTTP protocol.
Util This class provides several utility methods that are used by com.esri.mo2.client.io and com.esri.mo2.client.aims package.
 

Exception Summary
AuthenticationFailedException This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to access a service that has restricted access (requires username/password) and the given username/password combination was invalid.
AuthenticationRequiredException This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to access a service that has restricted access (requires username/password).
StreamIOException This exception is thrown when an Esrimap stream has an error.
UnableToPingEsrimapException This exception is thrown when trying to construct a BaseEsrimap object and the code is unable to ping the ESRIMAP.
WarningException This exception is thrown when an Esrimap stream has a warning.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.client.io Description

Provides proxies for AXL communication between clients and server.
